name: BigCommerce Sample App
description: A sample NodeJS app installable on BigCommerce stores

CLIENT_ID.description: The client id of your app, provided by the BigCommerce developer portal.

CLIENT_SECRET.description: The client secret of your app, provided by the BigCommerce developer portal.

AUTH_CALLBACK.description: The fully qualified authentication endpoint provided by this app. Replace the app name with the app name chosen above.

DB_TYPE.description: Which type of database we are using. Options are 'mysql' or 'firebase'. Can safely leave unchanged.

JWT_KEY.description: Key the app will use for signing JWT. Can safely leave unchanged.
